titleStmt.title: A cleare vindication of Roman Catholicks from a fowle aspersion to wit, that they have and do promote a bloody and wicked designe of the Pope and cardinals.
titleStmt.author: Franciscus a Sancta Clara, 1598-1680.

titleStmt.title: A cleare vindication of Roman Catholicks from a fowle aspersion to wit, that they have and do promote a bloody and wicked designe of the Pope and cardinals.
titleStmt.author: Franciscus a Sancta Clara, 1598-1680.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Francis Davenport [i.e., Franciscus a Sancta Clara]. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
